What I've been up to

Personal includes a simple blog with pagination.

Usability 1 Reflection Journal Week 6 & 7

In these final two weeks we had to select three videos from our classmates( the ones we recorded in week 5) and analyze the data. afterwards we had to create an final report.

Usability 1 Reflection Journal Week 5

In this week’s module we had the opportunity to learn about moderating a usabitly session.  We also learned about the golden rules of moderating.

Usability 1 Reflection Journal Week 4

For this week, our focus was to learn about Usability measurements  usability studies

Usability 1 Reflection Journal Week 3

For this week, our focus was to learn about creating recruiting screeners and creating tasks for usability studies.

Usability 1 Reflection Journal Week 2

In this Week’s module we were introduces to Summative and formative Usability studies.

Usability 1 Reflection Journal Week 1

This was the first week of usability 1. a class I have been excited to start since enrolling in the program.

Interaction Design Reflective Journal Week 7

This week our task was to create a design evaluation or usability test for our prototypes.
